TopicTitle: Log spam and tracking station broken.

Articles.Content:
When I went to the tracking station in my sandbox save, this happened:

The sun and the atmosphere is not visible anymore, and apparently the other planets are gone too.

While spawning crafts it says focus = Eeloo or some random celestial body, and there is still night all the time.

The timewarp to morning was broken too and warped only like 20 minutes each time I used it.

KSP.log

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ja3sfv1l2lqa6o2/output_log.txt?dl=1'>Output_Log.txt

I just installed Connected living space before opening ksp

, and now uninstalled it.

Note: I installed Pathfinder and Wildblue tools after this bug happened(and after closing ksp).

I will retry to see if the problem is still there.

EDIT: The problem happens when I select Jedlas Kerman, who is apparently splashed down in the sun:confused:

Edited October 9, 2015 by Thegamer211
I'm having the same issue, even after a fresh install.
